title: accamillAk-kavi piccuvayyar
sahitya:
accamillAk-kavi piccuvayyar tanda arum tamizh marandiDumO


anupallavi

  paTSamuDanE veNbA viruttangaLaip-pADa balE sbhAS enrennaip-payanurat-tUNDinAn


caraNam    kaNNAra yAn kaNDa kALamEgham avan kavitaik-kalai vaLarum karpaka mAyinan
maNNukkum viNNukkum shlEDai mayakkuvAn mannan bhAskara sEtupati magizhum pulavan
